title: Who Earns Most in Pro Cycling? Report Ranks Salaries, from Pogačar to Van der Poel and Beyond
content:
Gazzetta dello Sport estimates pay for the top-10 earners in the WorldTour – and there are a few surprises.

Read the full article at Who Earns Most in Pro Cycling? Report Ranks Salaries, from Pogačar to Van der Poel and Beyond on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
